description: Northern Ireland defender Conor Bradley is to remain sidelined for a "few weeks", according to Liverpool boss Arne Slot.
title: Conor Bradley: Northern Ireland defender out for a 'few weeks', says Liverpool boss Arne Slot
title_page: Conor Bradley: Northern Ireland defender out for a 'few weeks', says Liverpool boss Arne Slot - BBC Sport
